mapper.insert: insert into fileBoard (idx, name, password, subject, content, regDate) values (notice_idx_seq.nextval,#{name},#{password},#{subject},#{content},SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update notice set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, regDate=SYSDATE where idx=#{idx}
update notice set clickCount = clickCount + 1 where idx=#{idx}"
